Content:: Chandima Weerakkody MP (born 23 May 1968) is a Member of Parliament representing the Galle District.[1]He is currently a member of parliament representing Galle district.[2] Chandima was the former Cabinet Minister of Petroleum & Petroleum Gas.[3] He was also the Deputy Speaker of the 14th Parliament of Sri Lanka and Chairman of Committees. He is a lawyer by profession and was educated at St. Aloysius' College, Galle and Nalanda College Colombo.[4]  This article about a politician from Southern Province, Sri Lanka is a stub.
